mapper.sql: id, status, createDate, lastModDate, questionId, expertId, answer, answerHtml
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO shishuo_answer ( status, createDate, lastModDate, questionId, expertId, answer, answerHtml ) VALUES ( #{status}, #{createDate}, #{lastModDate}, #{questionId}, #{expertId}, #{answer}, #{answerHtml} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE shishuo_answer
status = #{status},
createDate = #{createDate},
lastModDate = #{lastModDate},
questionId = #{questionId},
expertId = #{expertId},
answer = #{answer},
answerHtml = #{answerHtml},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE shishuo_answer
status = #{map.status},
createDate = #{map.createDate},
lastModDate = #{map.lastModDate},
questionId = #{map.questionId},
expertId = #{map.expertId},
answer = #{map.answer},
answerHtml = #{map.answerHtml},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shishuo_answer ( status, createDate, lastModDate, questionId, expertId, answer, answerHtml ) VALUES ( #{map.status}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.lastModDate}, #{map.questionId}, #{map.expertId}, #{map.answer}, #{map.answerHtml} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM shishuo_answer
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND status like CONCAT('%', #{status} , '%')
AND createDate like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND lastModDate like CONCAT('%', #{lastModDate} , '%')
AND questionId like CONCAT('%', #{questionId} , '%')
AND expertId like CONCAT('%', #{expertId} , '%')
AND answer like CONCAT('%', #{answer} , '%')
AND answerHtml like CONCAT('%', #{answerHtml} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
